__e: I said someone shot him, but wasn't at all suggesting you hired someone to do the job!
I want to ask you something. Why did you transfer a guy like me from the police force?
Maybe because you gave it to whoever you hired to do the job.
We hired her to pretend to be Han's girlfriend while his mom's in town.
Well, isn't that why you were hired, to bring him the baby?
To answer your question, my name is Walter O'Brien, and I was brought in to fix your problem since you're not capable of doing it yourself.
So you had no idea that your son hired Scott to smear your reputation?
Well, I'm sorry to have to tell you, Dr. Li, that... this was your brother who hired those men to kidnap you.
But it probably explains why Ray hired you to kill me and didn't do it himself.
I can make you tell me who hired you.
I'm not the same woman I was when she hired me.
Well, run back to whoever hired you.
And whatever job he was hired for isn't finished.
He said his name was Charlie, and he told me that he was hired to follow me and to report back to Joe.
Bye. Yeah, she killed a guy who was hired to kill me.
And that's why she took a job across the street and didn't tell me.
Now, who did you hire, and are they still after Walter?
I was hired to do a job, and my duty is to finish it.
When I hired you, I didn't realize that you were such a coward.
I don't know much about the man I hired, but I'll tell you what I can.
I can't believe I hired you buttholes!
